data.title: New York Rangers announce 2012-13 Regular Season schedule
data.meta_description: It is official fans, hockey has returned, here is the 2012-13 regular season schedule for the New York Rangers who are set to have their home opener on Sunday, Jan 20 against the Pittsburgh Penguins at 7:00 p.m. The 48-game schedule will feature meetings against the Boston Bruins, the Philadelphia Flyers and the Washington Capitalsâ€¦
data.text:
It is official fans, hockey has returned, here is the 2012-13 regular season schedule for the New York Rangers who are set to have their home opener on Sunday, Jan 20 against the Pittsburgh Penguins at 7:00 p.m.

The 48-game schedule will feature meetings against the Boston Bruins, the Philadelphia Flyers and the Washington Capitals along with New York rivals the New York Islanders.

The first Battle for the Big Apple will take place on Thursday, March 7 at 7 p.m. and Saturday, April 13 at 7 p.m.

For those fans wanting full season plans can click on the link below to enjoy exclusive subscriber benefits, including flexible monthly payment plans and full Stanley Cup playoff rights:

http://rangers.nhl.com/club/page.htm?id=78427
